ingredients.ingredient: 6 (1.5 ounce) bars milk chocolate candy bars (such as Hershey's®)

cookingTips: Layer chocolate with milk to create smooth base, then top with marshmallows
Bake at 350°F for 10-12 minutes until marshmallows are golden and beginning to brown
Serve immediately with graham crackers for dipping while warm and gooey
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do you achieve the perfect balance between melted chocolate and toasted marshmallows in this dip?
